name: Papanapple Island
description: A pineapple-shaped island located in Paradise between Alabasta and Jaya. The island is abundant with unusual pineapple-like fruits and appears to be uninhabited by humans, though monkeys are present.

keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates discover and land on Papanapple Island to gather fresh fruit supplies after leaving Alabasta
keyEvents.significance: Serves as the setting for the Post-Arabasta character-development filler episode focusing on Chopper and Robin

keyEvents.description: The crew gathers around a campfire on the island to celebrate their successful supply mission, though Robin sits apart from the group
keyEvents.significance: The campfire scene provides a symbolic moment highlighting Robin's emotional isolation from the crew

notes: Papanapple Island is anime-original filler content and does not appear in the manga. It's one of two pineapple-themed filler islands in the One Piece anime.
